critter.name: Sturgeon
critter.desc: The sturgeon is a large and long-lived fish which has changed little in the last 300 million years. One curious behavior of theirs is leaping high out of the water and falling back in on their sides. The smacking sounds of their re-entry can be heard for up to half a mile away, likely more underwater! No one knows why they do it, but I like to think it's their impression of bread popping out of toaster!
critter.quote: I caught a sturgeon! Wonder if it can perform sturgery...
